content.detailedDescription: On august 24th around 2:45 a.M. i witnessed an orange pulsating orb in the sky to the north northwest i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette when i noticed left eye i quickly turned on the video on my galaxy exhibit 4g but the video is not very good i am a us air force veteran and i've seen many aircraft at night as well as growing up near pensacola regional airport in pensacola florida i am aware of what aircraft, look like at night from different angles with their lights on and such and i have never seen anything that fits the description of the craft that i saw. this is the second strange encounter i've had in the last 2 years my brother also had a strange encounter in between grand rapids and hastings where he has a farm. i also have a strange photo from that he took from that evening.
content.summary: Bright orange pulsating orb heading from west to north northwest or downtown grand rapids michigan

content.detailedDescription: We was walking down our park drive towards our apt bldg., i looked up towards the east and saw what i thought at 1st might have been a star, but it was not white, it was orange/yellow. we stopped and i asked my friend "is that moving". we observed and it was indeed moving,slowly. we then noticed some kind of sparks (like small fireballs) being emitted from below the object. the object was decreasing and increasing in size. it followed at straight path towards the northwest. changing diameter and emitting the sparks. there was no noise heard.. when it was a little farther toward the n/west it started to fade in and out, then it faded completely. after about 20 seconds it came back on glowing real bright (sunlike) for about 10 seconds then blinked out. my feelings were excited, after witnessing a similar object in the same area about 3 weeks prior. also when i was about 17, my family and i witnessed a hovering craft in the field next to our house, and we also had a loss of time. so this is interesting to me. i don't know what this was, but it was amazing to see.
content.summary: Fireball flying above emiting intermitant sparks from below object

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to view the iss i have the app that tells you were and when to look. 
just as i saw the iss this object that initially looked like a star started moving
towards the iss it was much brighter than the iss the object moved up on the iss
fast when it got up on the iss it did not stay with it long maybe 5 seconds
then it moved in the opposite direction i watched it cross the sky and it looked
like it just faded away like it really accelarated.
content.summary: Was viewing iss and ufo followed it

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on the beach at wallis sands state park in rye nh, around 3:30 pm, facing the ocean.

the 4 of us all sighted a metallic looking silver object in the sky, toward the southeast over the ocean.  the weather was clear (cloudless), sunny (sun toward the southwest), no clouds or haze to obscure the sighting.  at first it was quite bright, as if the sun was glinting off a shiny silver metallic surface, and it appeared to be either disc or cigar shaped.  it appeared to be moving slowly from south to north, like a distant airplane.  at first we thought it was a plane, but it looked unusual to us, and one of us even mentioned "maybe it's a ufo!"

at that point the object had darkened, as if it was no longer reflecting the sun toward us.  i turned around to grab my camera to try and get a picture of it, and when i turned back, it was gone.  it disappeared completely, and mundane objects like airplanes and birds don't just vanish.  i searched the sky to see if there was a plane but there wasn't.  my friends who kept watching it while i got the camera said it just disappeared suddenly without a trace.

it was visible for about 20-30 seconds as we were talking about it since it was so bright at first.  the object was in a clear blue sky, some distance away and fairly high up, like an airplane would be, and i would have to guess it was about the size of a small plane, though we had no frame of reference; it could have been a larger object farther away or a smaller one closer up.

no sound was heard from the object, and we didn't notice any unusual movements other than its sudden disappearance.  i would have just shrugged it off as an airplane if a friend didn't mention "ufo" and then it disappeared.
content.summary: Metallic disc object sighted over ocean while sitting on beach.  saw it for about 20 seconds, then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in my backyard at precisely 8:15 pm. i saw a light, brighter than a bright star, moving faster than an airplane would move, in the ssw sky. then two more lights appeared, moving at the same speed as the first light. they were precisely (it appeared to me) in a straight line. there was no sound. i watched for about 1 minute. then the first and third lights went out, leaving only the middle light to observe. it stopped moving in the path it was on suddenly, and stayed in place--again in the ssw sky. it dimmed and looked then like an ordinary star, but was slightly moving in a random, somewhat angled manner, little jerky movements. i watched it for about 5 minutes and decided to come in a write this report. no sound, too far away to see any shape. going back out to see if it still there.
i figured out quickly they were not aircraft (no sound, moving too fast), and then decided that they were not air balloons, (again too fast, none of the whish sound that balloons make when they fire up the burner to elevate them). they certainly weren't flares because they were not dropping to the ground. many years ago, while living in syracuse i once saw three ufo's in the sky, but they were not as bright as these were, and formed a much tighter formation than these did tonight. my general feeling was interest, curiosity. i quickly eliminated what it "wasn't", and then realized it might well be a ufo.

thanks,

gary guimond
major,usaf ret.
content.summary: Three very bright lights observed. equidistant from each other. no sound. suddenly, two lights extinquished. one light remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
I must mention i reported this sighting to a website called (mystical universe) it was posted in 2001 and i was contacted by someone representing themselves as mufon investigator in that year. i was asked to tell my story somewhere down in detroit. i had to decline because i was working at the time. i'm now retired and have pondered my experience over the years, so much, i've investigated other reported sightings taking place in the same month and year to compare to my sighting. i was looking on a website listing sightings taken place in michigan, during march of 2000, finding to my surprise no listing by you or anyone else of my sighing. why i'm submitting again. 

i think(mystical universe website) still carries a archive of sightings reported to them over the years, at least it did when i looked up my sighting a couple of years ago. so rather go in depth here again. i'll report the basics you ask for, leaving you to check out the other websites archives or contact me for any additional info.

1) michigan, huron county, heading south on bayport rd alias (colwood rd), working (driving) on the way home from a weekly delivery route. approx. 3:00 to 4:00 pm.    

2) the sun reflecting off it, as it flew over a small patch of woods embedded between to farm fields.

3) maybe, large ice or nickel meteorite, run away weather balloon or a low flying ,man made, satellite.

4) mostly sphere in shape, made up of varied (in sizes) octagon shaped, flat like faucets in a unevenly cut diamond, making up it's entire round shape, and the only things to be definitely identified, all reflecting in the sun light a nickel shiny color to the whole of the object. best compared to as a unperfectly round soccer ball, with what maybe a tiny tail with a very little white exhaust, noticed has object passed in front of me.. it flew fast, like a low flying jet, flying above the trees as much as the trees were in height. figure 200ft. no sound as it passed in front of me as in a straight line west to east, me heading north to south. i estimate the size 25ft to 50ft.  

5) thought a ice meteorite if there's such a thing or low flying satellite.  slowed and stopped the truck approx. a half a block away to observe as it passed in front of me and disappearing in seconds, blending into the farm fields, i thought it was going to crash, if not into lake huron, canada for sure. never heard a word of a impact.  the sighting has made a skeptic into a believer, baffling me all these years later.  

6) it's speed allowed only 2 seconds of view once it passed in front of me, however the object coming from the west allowed much more time to observe because of angle to approach, north to south for me and west to east for it. can sketch the object if need be.
content.summary: Roundish object seen close on return trip of delivery truck driver, during daylight hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo incident
sierra del cautivo section
sierra madre oriental
at the point of the border of the states of tamsulipas and nuevo leon, approximately 30 miles north-northwest of ciudad victoria, tamaulipas, mexico




the hours between 20:50, 2 august 2013 and 03:00 3 august 2013:


     at that time it is usually possible to find me on the west-facing corridor of our little adobe home in a rural area about 25 miles northwest of ciudad victoria, tamaulipas.  the west-facing view gives a good point of observation of the complex of the sierra del cautivo, which is a cordillera of the general ranges of the sierra madre oriental.   the elevations change sharply from our place....At about 1,000 feet....To parallel ridges of increasingly high mountains that rise to over 5,000 feet within 5 miles of our little place and then on up to nearly 13,000 feet within 30 miles as one moves further to the west.   these mountains are essentially impenetrable,  very rugged.   go to our quinta tesoro de la sierra madre website and use our google earth feature to check out the area to the west. 
 


 

     this area has continuing mentions of ufo activity, as do many places in mexico.   it is not at all uncommon for the rural people to immediately extol tales of sightings, in the most matter-of-fact tones, once the subject is brought up.  i have seen peculiar, very high elevation (satellite level) activity on various occasions during the fifty years or so of my being present in the zone, generally known as the santa engracia area, named for the original spanish colonial hacienda whose original structure is still a useable facility, in the form of a very nice guest lodge.
 



      guests at that lodge, as well as our little place, have commented to us about their sightings, almost always the extremely high "night-orbs" that change directions suddenly and that travel radically much faster than either the common night-time satellites or jetliners.    a distinct minority of reports by any respondent pertain to lower elevation manifestation, but the tales, reports, and serious mention by reasonable people are not that uncommon.   so, in a way, i was prepared for, and unprepared for the occurrences of that episode that straddled the hours that accompany the change from the 2nd to the 3rd of august, 2013.
 
 

      just before heavy rains that would fall three and four days later, my view through the gardens and foliage of our grounds was excellent to the west and the first three or four ridges of the sierra del cautivo.  it began suddenly during the last remaining light from the previous day.   the lingering summer sunset behind those mountains allowed for a bit of discernment of detail of the topography, especially it being the case that it is something that has long been programmed into this observer's brain's "hard-drive".  towards the base of the mountains to the direct, due west, an orb of pale yellowish light, flashed in right to left....Arriving from general direction of the famous site of the el chorrito religious sanctuary...About 40 miles straight line distance to the north.
 


     my first notion was that i must have seen a lightning bug and dirty glasses or humidity or something played a trick on my perception.   a cleaning with the tail of my t-shirt, a further check for any particularly chubby or high-speed lightning bugs revealed neither impediment to normal perception.   then, as i rose up from my rocking chair, a number of the orbs came in on the same route in fairly quick succession.  all of them went to the openning in the otherwise solid wall of the sierra del cautivo...An openning caused by the canyon of el tigre, and the site of the famous springs by the same name.  the canyon itself stretches back a couple of score, very tortuous kilometres, much of which is presenced by springs that normally flow continuously.    the mountains here are also famous for semi-precious stones, gold, copper, some silver, and lead production, dating back to the colonial period ending around the beginning of the revolution of 1910.  there are also massive stands of pine and tropical oak that have gradually and steadily recovered during the past couple of generations.
 
 

      in any regard, these orbs....All identical in my determination...Continued to move rapidly to that point that marks where the canyon of el tigre opens the sierra del cautivo.   the orbs would stop incredibly quickly...Essentially instantaneously.    there seemed to be...Perhaps....A bit of vacillation, and then the orbs would disappear into the canyon.   a few orbs continued down five miles further to the south and do their hovering at the canyon of the san pedros....Another spring-fed rivulet and canyon complex.
 
 

     i went and stood on the iron cover of our pozo de barbacoa, which affords an even better view to the west.  we then went to the neighbour's gate...(very nearby...40 yards) where one could take in nearly the full length of the scene.   during all this time, orbs would come in on their mad dash to the canyon opennings, intermittently.  while the vast majority came in from the due north, there were a few that seemed to come in from the east-northeast, as though from the gulf of mexico.   foolishly, i did not immediately start a count, and it was known that any attempt at taking  pictures would be pointless.   during this time, i made a generous peanut butter and jelly sandwich and poured myself a large glass of milk, then returned to our corridor to consume it all.  my dog and the three cats had even begun to pick up on the rapid travellers and they joined me, gazing out to the west.   the intermittent, but sustained arrival of orbs continued.   at an early morning hour i did call my wife in texas to tell her what was being witnessed.  the few orbs that came from the east-northeast came closer to passing more or less "overhead", and they seemed to be about 2000 feet above ground level.   there was no sound associated with the flights, and the luminousness of the orbs did not seem to pass their light beyond the orbs themselves.
 
 

     while at the earliest points of the observation, it was my thought that they were more numerous, but after counting the minutes and seconds between later appearances, my best estimate is that there were perhaps as many as 45 to 50 different orbs.   after eight seemed to come out of the sierra del cautivo and went back on a northeast trajectory....At extreme speed...Incomprehensible....Things went "dead" after 03:00 on the morning of the 3rd of august.   it was a sleepless night, but there was no tiredness or sleepiness.  we normally awaken around 03:30 anyway to prepare coffee and feed the animals.   then i will listen to a particular radio program from houston (kilt - 610 am) that deals with hunting and fishing issues.  i went out on several occasions, but saw no more orbs nor any other inexplicable manifestations.
 
 

i swear upon my faith that the above account is a fair and accurate representation of the events of the times and dates and locations cited

 

thanks for your time and interest.   any questions or comments will be received and responded to with interest and sincerity.
content.summary: Several orbs, extreme speed, stop instantly, move into mountain canyon. 40 - 50 orbs, 6 hours, 8 leave to ne

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At the time i was at the park walking around. i first noticed the object when i heard loud buzzing. i honestly don't know. it amazed me.. nothing like i have ever seen before, but i think somehow it knew i saw it.
it was moving then it stopped for awhile. my vision was going blurry, went dizzy, and my head started hurting around 5 minutes after observing it.
it flew away astonishingly fast.
content.summary: Nothing like i have ever seen in my life.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out window to enjoy the weather when i first noticed high flying jet. i observed jet for a moment when i saw it pass a bright light apparently higher in sky.Assumed it was another plane but could see any detail.Got my camera with 18-135mm af lens to get a shot but the af could not focus.Switched to a manuel focus 500mm cat.Set to infinty. set camera to shuter priority at 1000/sec.Took one shot before lost object overhead.My building now blocked view.On reveiwing photo i still could not tell what type of aircraft it was. zoomed all the way on image and can only see three white lights in a triangular formation.The space between lights appears same as sky.I then took photos of jets with same camera/lens setup,but at 2000/sec speed for comparison. the jet aircraft are easily seen.
content.summary: Clear sky,bright lights,commercial aircraft at lower altitudes.

content.detailedDescription:
Refer to photos . 
while navigating around my daughters house/neighborhood ( 7 miles from my own home)using google earth i noticed  what appears to be  a ufo over her house  and took many freeze frames of  it using my ipad . i left the photos alone for over a year until a friend saw them and suggested i share them. 
when i first saw it i immediately knew  that  it  must more than likely  be a ufo based on the shape &  similar images that  i've seen & heard about in the past  & cannot explain it away by anything else such as another light source. i suppose that my proof would be this. the images were not taken by me. these are actual satellite images taken from google earth that i just happened to capture while doing some neighborhood research.  i was able to freeze that frame by capturing it using an ipad feature. perhaps you can go back and find the  same images i'm not sure.Im not exactly sure about the date but took a guess based on my recollection but i'm sure if i research some more i may find it . ithe google image has  probably changed since .  i don't know much about google earth but i am pretty sure that their images are updated from time to time. i think i'll check it out more often from now on. let me know what your experts say. i have many more photos than i was able to submit because i uploaded individually rather than file. (not sure how and didn't want to risk losing all of this data.) they are of course available upon request.  i'd appreciate it. thanks,
content.summary: While navigating around my daughters house/neighborhood  using google earth i noticed  what appears to be  the ufo over her house  and took many freeze frames of  it

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling in car after work with friend, heading north, took picture of cloud formation.  sun was behind the car.  photo captured object noticed it in photo later that evening.  object moved at incredible speed.
f-stop  f/2.4   exposure 1/3717 sec.  iso speed 100 focal length 5mm
content.summary: Caught in photo

content.detailedDescription: I was setting up my telescope for observation and noticed an orange light moving east. it made a right angle turn and disappeared quickly to the south. it was followed by a second object on the same path and with same behavior. a third followed. speed was high subsonic with no noise. heavy air traffic to btv at that time. the objects initial path of travel was 45 degrees right of approzch pattern. altitude was difficult to judge. no sound. speed was at least high subsonic. observer is former military pilot and civilian pilot for over 30 years. amateur astronomer for 40 years. i have never seen anything like this and have not come up with plausible explanation. attempted to video with cellphone but no success.
content.summary: 3 consecutive orange balls. right angle turn.

content.detailedDescription:
2013, friday aug 24, 9:50pm
.
viewing location: harrison township, mi  - on lake saint clair - north of l���anse creuse bay.
.
wife and i were sitting outside on the deck looking at the night sky, facing south. there were no clouds and visibility was near perfect.
.
i first noticed a small star colored object that was moving and pointed it out to my wife who then saw it easily. i keep a pair of 20 x 80 binoculars nearby and i immediately attempted to view the object through these. this took three attempts as the object was moving fast in a east-se direction.
.
we live 2 miles south of the selfridge air national guard base. this object was nearly overhead, thus it was easily within the base���s restricted air space, of about a 5 mile radius.
.
when i finally got the binoculars lined up with the object it was already heading away from us. still, it appeared about the size of a grape held at arm���s length. the light intensity was so bright that it could not have been a conventional aircraft. it was the color of a star. it���s shape was hard to distinguish due to the light intensity, but i would guess it was oval. the light did not have distinct edges.
.
as it continued away from us, it did not turn, descend or ascend.  it continued straight, going east-se over the lake, until the light diminished to a point and disappeared. total viewing duration was about 20 seconds.
content.summary: Star colored, fast moving oval light near selfridge air national guard base

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving at work at approx. 2125 when i happened to notice several bright orange lights  ( like street lights) in a line in the sky. i stopped the vehicle got out and looked at the sky to see what the lights were, that's when i noticed approximately 12 blinking lights amongst the stars. they were not blinking like stars or like aircraft, more of a almost random blinking. they were bright white light similar to a star. i instantly realized these objects were something very unusual, i look at the stars a lot and have never seen anything like what i saw. 
 the objects were spread around the sky ( no formation).  within about a minute i noticed the objects were moving, some in line in pairs some by themselves. they seemed to be moving much faster than aircraft or satellites, the objects were all heading to the southeast, concentrating in one section of the sky in the south east until no longer visible. there were additional craft coming in from the north and north east also heading south east. shortly after most of the craft were no longer visible i saw an airplane flying overhead. this whole event took no more than a couple minutes. i was completely shocked i had goosebumps, i have never seen anything like it in my life. i could instantly rule out meteors , satellites, planes all which i have seen plenty of times. these objects flew in a controlled way and flew in the same direction after being stationary.
content.summary: Several orange lights in sky, dozen white light craft stationary to moving.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Saw something unusual near new germany, nova scotia on the 20th of august, 2013. 3 of us were sitting and chatting outside in a garden on a clear, quiet night, shortly after dusk. the area is very rural, lots of empty wilderness. i looked up and saw a very visible light pass overhead and joked "anybody believe in ufos? there's one". it struck me as being a bit strange, due to its fiery colour and its full shape. we all watched it. the light was bright , warm like fire and round, although slightly pointed on the front and back like a short olive pit. moving slow like a satellite, but lower, similar to the height of a 2 person plane. suddenly the craft took off, straight up but a bit irregular and faded like a spark into the stars. i think we were in line with the trajectory that it bolted upwards in, so it bounced around slightly as it went up (would have likely looked like a straight line from the side)- reminds me of what sparks look like as they bounce around and dissappear if you look above a campfire (note we weren't having a fire). it wasn't until after it took off that we realized it was in fact some kind of ufo. my friend who is in his mid 40's said he was a skeptic until now. there is no denying what we saw was out of this world!
content.summary: Light moved in one direction for a bit and then shot upwards towards the stars

content.detailedDescription:
I was just looking at the stars as i usually do when its clear. i live in montreal near the airport, so i know the flight paths the planes use. one light which i thought was a plane didn't follow the usual plane movements. this plane behind trees. did not move like all other planes i see in the area. slowed down twice and changed direction before emerging above the tree instead of the other side (the planes move on the horizon from west to east, this object went west to north.) kept moving up until it stopped, turn on its axis 90 degrees or so, moved up again. now almost 75 degrees above the horizon, it stopped again and "turned on" some side light. it looked bell shaped, but a bulky bell, white shinny surface. these light, 3-4 of them on the "sides" and 2-3 on the top bubble of this object. light changed from white to blue, red yellow, slowly turning another 90 degrees towards the east. then it slowly started to dip back down the tree line, still blinking and spining a bit faster now. it moved with an arc to the west below the trees and lost it. never saw it again, i stayed out for another 2 hours. 
no emotions while i was observing the object. just happiness on my end, i finally saw a ufo!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a plane behind trees. did not move like all other planes i see in the area. slowed down twice and changed direction before emerging above the tree. kept moving up until it stopped, turn on its axis 90 degrees or so, on moved up again.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home on the 3th floor and as i do was looking out the window looking at the weather. i looked down the town an in the sky a light cough my eye,i knew it was not right at all,at first i was like what the f@@k and then i was looking for my camera only to have let in my sisters 2 nights ago it was her daughter debs..Well i kept looking it was like a ball of fire tumbling but not falling,it moved to the south blinked out and let a trace of clouds behind in,im almost sure i see a oval shaped craft behind it,it seem to melt or blend in to the clouds...Ps its not the first time i see such things......
content.summary: In the east was a ball of light about 500meters above the city ,under the clouds it looked like it was on fire,it moved then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i were smoking cigarettes out on my back deck when out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright white light brighter than venus moving swiftly and silently across the sky over our heads.  i interrupted our conversation to have my two friends watch as well.  we all agreed it did not look like a plane.  it had no red or flashing lights and moved much faster than an airplane as it moved from the northwest toward the southeast over us.  it basically traveled straight that direction but was making sudden slight shifts in trajectory that seemed to agile for standard aircraft. we all watched in amazement and walked out into the yard to keep an eye on it as it went behind the trees on the back edge of my property and eventually dipped under the horizon.   my phone was inside and the only one of us who had one failed to get video before it was gone.
content.summary: Bright star like light flew overhead at incredible speed shifting trajectory in impossibility agile ways

content.detailedDescription:
I was crabbing with my family in charleston oregon.  i looked up as i was also star gazing and saw a ufo traveling from the north to the south.  when i pointed it out to my family the only other one that saw it was my niece.  it then flashed and disappeared into blackness or space. i thought that it was a satellite at first but a satellite doesn't move like that.  that was at 9:10 pm.  at 9:28pm i saw another ufo going from the south to the north acting the same way and it also disappeared.  at 9:40pm i saw another ufo traveling from the northwest to the southeast across the sky making a total of 3 ufo's in a time frame of about 30 minutes.  i then packed up and went home to come and report these incidents to mufon.
i see ufo's on a regular basis and we seem to be getting a lot of action up here.  

thank you
content.summary: Ufo was traveling and flashing.  when i pointed it out to my family it dove into space and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
we where at the mustang city park, in mustang, ok. with family and friends to watch, the fireworks. there where fireworks exploding in a 360 degree's around us. my sister-in-law said jeff look a ufo,i looked where she pointed. it was above a building in front of us.  i pulled out my samsung digital camera. i took two,maybe three pictures.  my sister-in-law recorded on her phone. i at first thought was a firework,
    it was moving very fast,a firework went off near it. it looked like, it jumped,away from the explosion.  you can see it jump between the first and second picture. i was excited.  it was my first good sighting, it just faded way from us,and was gone.  can you let us know if anyone else reported it.
content.summary: We went to the park to see, and light off fireworks.

content.detailedDescription: My gf and i were laying in the hammock star gazing one night.  there was no moon and no cloud cover and the humidity was low so the sky was crystal clear.  lots of stars.  we both saw the object originate on the northern horizon as it moved in a southerly direction.  the object was approximately 1000 feet off the ground, made absolutely no sound and moved in an irregular zig zag pattern.  it was triangular in shape and at the edge of each angle there was a half orb.  three half orbs were visible which gave the appearance of a triangle shaped craft.  the half orbs were the color of a very faint deep reddish orange.  the object took less than 4 seconds to move across the entire sky from north to south.  as it moved it would disappear and then reappear.  however, when it reappeared it was in a different horizontal location in the sky.  this is what gave the appearance of a zig zag pattern.  since it moved north to south the zig zag pattern was west to east.  it appeared and disappeared 4 times in less than 4 seconds.  the moment i saw the object i knew immediately i was witnessing a ufo.  i served for many years in the army and had ample exposure to friendly and enemy aircraft from all across the globe.  i was trained in height and speed estimation of aircraft as it was important for us to be able to identify aircraft as friendly or enemy.  nothing i have ever witnessed moved in the manner of the object i witnessed that evening.  the speed was unmeasurable.  there was absolutely no sound and the fact that it seemed to teleport is what was most amazing.  i didn't so much feel that it actually flew but more like it would teleport from point to point.  my gf witnessed the object as well and as soon as it was out of sight she looked at me wide eyed and asked me what it was.  i told her we just witnessed a legitimate ufo.
content.summary: Triangle shape aerial path in zig zag pattern

content.detailedDescription: 8-18-2013 at 6:51 am, i was taking pictures of the sunrise and the clouds of a thunderstorm which was traveling down the san joaquin valley's east side along the foothills towards our area clovis ca earlier in the morning that was dissipating. when i downloaded the pictures to the computer i noticed i had caught 3 objects in the sky. my first thought was i had caught something that i couldn't explain but looked to me that i had captured 3 ufo's but of what?  since it's a still picture you have to look at it to see what i am talking about. then after looking at the second picture which i took like 5-10 seconds later, just to the right of the objects in the first photo, i noticed 4 faint black dots in the second picture. when i was taking the pictures i didn't see or hear any birds,jets, airplanes, helicopters, nothing. after i had seen the photo's i contacted and showed the picture to a sanger california paranormal radio talk show host jeffery gonzales, showed him the pictures and he didn't know what they were? i was really excited that i might have captured real ufo's but without the proper photo enhancing equipment i can't sit here honestly and say what they are. all i know is that i would like to know what i had captured in these 2 pictures and if they are explained to be something else then what i feel, that's fine with me. that's why i am contacting mufon. if mufon has there doubts then i assume i will hear from you. i feel that before you come to a conclusion you make sure what you say has to be supported and proved before saying anything. the camera i used is a olympus fe-230 7.1 digital camera and i did not use the zoom when taking these shots. my daughter tried to enhance the first picture so there will be 2 pictures of the first shot i took. the second picture i only have the picture without enhancement. the second photo if you look above the 3rd tree on the right side of the picture, right above it you can faintly see 4 black dots? i assume then these objects were moving north to south from where i was standing. i have no idea what i caught but do i believe in ufo's? yes i do and love to investigate all stories, photo's and video people show.
content.summary: Taking a picture of clouds in the morning as a thunderstorm had fizzled out.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch on the third floor with my brother his girl friend and an old friend of ours. i first notice the object when i was looking up at the night sky. at first i thought it was a plane then i thought it was a satellite but the shape was all wrong. the object was moving very fast in a straight line towards the beach. it was red in color and it had a strange pattern on its surface that was not light up. i lost sight of it when it went past the trees.
content.summary: 4 people saw a redish triangular object moving south towards dane street beach

content.detailedDescription:
We recieved a call at our home in menasha from our son as he was driving home heading east on hwy 10 from their camper in the waupaca area. he asked us to go outside and see if we could see the swarm of bright lights in the sky west of us. 
 we went outside and observed 5 distinct lights that were as bright as venus is in the sky right now, but not nearly as large, just as bright. they were more of a pinpoint from the distance we were at from the objects and almost looked like you were looking at a very bright led flashlight from a distance. they moved up and down and left to right with no apparent or distinguishable pattern of movement, the lights would flash on for about 2 seconds per flash, but did not flash in any regular pattern or time interval. while we observed them they seemed to be initially moving, darting, west, then came back east toward our direction, then went west again until they just went out of sight. we observed vapor trails occasionally while they darted about. there was no sound initially, but about a minute after they disappeared we heard what sounded like thunder coming from the west. 
  our son had a better observation. as he was driving home from the waupaca area heading east on hwy 10 he spotted these bright objects in the sky. he stopped and pulled over to observe them along with his wife and 2 children. he called quite a few people that also observed the lights as we did. he said they were swarming around each other like nothing he'd seen before because they were so fast. he has observed fighter planes dog fight training when in the army, but these object appeared much closer to one another and were moving much faster. he said there was no sound, which seemed odd to him because he would have expected to hear sound at his proximity to the objects. they then dispersed, flew west, then back to the east, then west again at great speed and disappeared.
  following our observation of the bright lights, we observed 3 more objects moving from south to north. these appeared more satelite like, very much like the iss as it passes by. very bright, then fade out. first one was about 2 minutes following the dissappearance of the 5 bright objects. it came out a ssw direction heading north and was only lit a few seconds until it was about 40 degrees above ssw. the next one came from due south went directly over the zenith and disappeared at about 70 degrees above north. the third was just about 30 degrees more to the east, appeared from overhead heading north and disappeared at about 45 degrees above north. 
very odd. 
after that we observed fast moving aircraft. 2 came from the southeast, one fron northwest all moving fast. two of them crossed paths very near the area we observed the 5 objects, the other from the southeast went in a more westerly direction. we have never seen anything like this chain of events before. very odd.
content.summary: Son called, observed 5 swarming bright objects in sky overhead, 12miles west of appleton on hwy 10. we went out side and could see them until they sped west and disappeared. followed by other unusual sightings soon after. interesting

content.detailedDescription: It happens every nite ! please call.  the lights just don't make triangles!  i'm talking big shapes! please call , will explain. don't want to say to much like this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Every nite-see them take off with escort chopper. please call -will explain-u show lights tv

content.detailedDescription: I reported this sighting shortly after in june.Tonight aug 23,i was compelled to look at my cities website[portcolborne.Ca]low and behold on this website appears to be a video posted on youtube on portcolborne.Ca of what appears to be the same u.F.O that i witnessed on june 1 2013 but this video was shot in 2010!!!The video is of of a triangular object with three spherical white lights but at times only two are illuminated exactly what i saw out of my window!What compelled me to get out of bed that night and look out the window to immediately witness this event and then see a video on youtube tonight of an identical object.I have goosebumps and am teary eyed and freaked out.I thought i should let you know.Check out the video on youtube at portcolborne.Ca.This is what i saw three years later fly by my window.I have chills knowing that this is a repeat event.Thanks.
content.summary: Spherical lights descended at 45 degree angle leveled at treetop level

content.detailedDescription: I have observed this event many times in the last year along with my family and have finally decided to come forward with it as i thought it maybe just a wierd coincidence but than after ayear decided to report it i am at my parents house we all have noticed it and have been like what the hell is that on most occations it is a tringle shale just like the illinois events by tinley park i have tried recording it a few times but everytime my phone cant zoom enough or i cant keep it steady enough to observe it clearly one min u will be watching the object and it just disappears than just like it disappeared it re apears
content.summary: Brilient redish lights like in illinois

content.detailedDescription: I was behind my grandparents car, and i was doing nothing else. my grandpa showed us the weird object. it made me feel weird and excited at the same time. i knew it was a ufo from the start! it  was hovering,vibrating, all sorts of stuff!!! it also had a weird glow. it was shaped like a triangle and had 7 lights around it. there were 5 different colors. after the sighting, i didn't play minecraft, i didn't do nothing! i went right on the nearest computer and reported that ufo sighting! that is my description of that weird sighting.
content.summary: It was unnerving and awesome at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: i  went  outside  my  uncles  to  look  at  stars...First  thought  object  venus..But  angle  on  horizon  was  too  low...Very  bright.. watched  for  5min  before  getting  binoculars...Observed  for  about  20 min  in  total..At  about  8.55..Object  started  moving  away  at  slow  speed...With  binoculars  saw  small  red  light  in  area  around  large  object...Watch  lighr  for  about 20  min  total...Heading  toward  us route  20  and ny  state  rd  12...Object  went  below  tree  line  and  out  of  sight
content.summary: Went  outside  to  look  at  stars..Obseved  bright  white  light at  distance

content.detailedDescription: We noticed this two days after the event when uploading photographs from a recent vacation. the image is of my children at niagara falls, and was taken by their sister, on the canadian side.  the camera is a vivitar vivicam 9112.  we can not identify/explain the object, but we were extremely excited when we noticed it in the photo!
content.summary: Saw after event in photograph, can not identify/explain object
